sentences.en: AIM : To compare the effect of restored molars meiso - occlusal cavity of filling with inlay and amalgam.
sentences.cn: 目的: 比较嵌体与银汞合金充填修复磨牙邻牙合面洞的疗效.

sentences.en: AIM : To understand the antibacterial property of amalgam alloys.
sentences.cn: 目的: 了解银汞合金的抗菌能力.

sentences.en: CONCLUSION: Amalgam had some antibacterial property.
sentences.cn: 结论: 银汞合金有一定的抗菌性能.

sentences.en: Her character is an amalgam of many different traits.
sentences.cn: 她的个性是许多不同特性的融合.

sentences.en: His theory is an amalgam of earlier ideas.
sentences.cn: 他的理论是早期观点的集合.

sentences.en: His work is a strange amalgam of several musical styles.
sentences.cn: 他的作品是数种音乐风格的奇特融合.

sentences.en: In 2006, with the review still incomplete, an independent FDA advisory panel of doctors and dentists rejected the agency's position that there is no reason for concern about the use of amalgam.
sentences.cn: 2006年，审查仍未完成，一个独立的美国食品药品管理局医生咨询小组和牙医拒绝接受该机构的立场，即没有理由担心汞合金的使用。

sentences.en: Many disadvantages of amalgam can be overcome by resin composite.
sentences.cn: 银汞合金的许多缺点都可以为复合树脂所克服.

sentences.en: Millions of people have received amalgam fillings, although their popularity has dropped off in recent years.
sentences.cn: 虽然近几年他们的普及程度有所减少，还是有数百万的人使用了汞合金填充物。

sentences.en: Objective To study the microleakage of amalgam filling with bonding resin.
sentences.cn: 目的研究树脂粘结技术对银汞合金充填时微渗漏的影响.

sentences.en: Or rather ( this being Los Angeles ) a fantasy amalgam of several town centres.
sentences.cn: 因其坐落于洛杉矶,更恰当一点说,它更像是几个城镇中心的混血儿.

sentences.en: Silver amalgam is used as a dental filling.
sentences.cn: 银汞合金用作牙的填料.

sentences.en: The best filling material is silver amalgam.
sentences.cn: 充填料以银汞合金为好.

sentences.en: The dentist used amalgam to fill my teeth.
sentences.cn: 牙医用汞合金给我补牙.

sentences.en: The film script is an amalgam of all three books.
sentences.cn: 这个电影脚本由三本书合成。

sentences.en: The new religion is an amalgam of supersitious beliefs and modern science.
sentences.cn: 这种新宗教是迷信和现代科学的混合物.

sentences.en: The new religion is an amalgam of superstitious beliefs and modern science.
sentences.cn: 新的宗教是封建信条和现代科学的结合.

words.tran_cn: 融合，混合；合并，联合；[冶] 混汞法，汞齐化法
合并；汞齐化；调制汞合金
合并；使（金属）汞齐化；混合
